definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Draw perspective formulas for the isomers of isoleucine.
sentences.chinese: 畫出異亮氨酸異構體的透視式。

sentences.english: For example rice is low in isoleucine and lysine.
sentences.chinese: 例如，米飯中的異亮氨酸和賴氨酸就非常少。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Isoleucine on growth and proliferation of human salivary glands cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討異亮氨酸對人腮腺細胞生長和增殖的影響。

sentences.english: The keti acid is converted to isoleucine by the activity of amino transferases.
sentences.chinese: 酮酸被氨基轉移酶轉變爲異亮氨酸。
